text.en:
FLIP: You can send face-up cards your opponent controls to the GY, up to the number of Flip monsters you control.
If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 other Flip monster, and if you do, Special Summon this card in Attack Position or face-down Defense Position. During your End Phase: You can target 1 Flip monster in your GY; Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "WAKE CUP! Erl" once per turn.
